   19: %%
   20: -module(erl_lint_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   26: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   27: -define(datadir, "erl_lint_SUITE_data").
   28: -define(privdir, "erl_lint_SUITE_priv").
   29: -define(t, test_server).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(datadir, proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   33: -define(privdir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -endif.
   35: 
   36: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0]).
   37: 
   38: -export([singleton_type_var_errors/1,
   39:          documentation_attributes/1,
   40:          unused_vars_warn_basic/1,
   41:          unused_vars_warn_lc/1,
   42:          unused_vars_warn_rec/1,
   43:          unused_vars_warn_fun/1,
   44:          unused_vars_OTP_4858/1,
   45:          unused_unsafe_vars_warn/1,
   46:          export_vars_warn/1,
   47:          shadow_vars/1,
   48:          unused_import/1,
   49:          unused_function/1,
   50:          unsafe_vars/1,unsafe_vars2/1,
   51:          unsafe_vars_try/1,
   52:          unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern/1,
   53:          guard/1, otp_4886/1, otp_4988/1, otp_5091/1, otp_5276/1, otp_5338/1,
   54:          otp_5362/1, otp_5371/1, otp_7227/1, binary_aliases/1,
   55:          otp_5494/1, otp_5644/1, otp_5878/1,
   56:          otp_5917/1, otp_6585/1, otp_6885/1, otp_10436/1, otp_11254/1,
   57:          otp_11772/1, otp_11771/1, otp_11872/1,
   58:          export_all/1,
   59:          bif_clash/1,
   60:          behaviour_basic/1, behaviour_multiple/1, otp_11861/1,
   61:          otp_7550/1,
   62:          otp_8051/1,
   63:          format_warn/1,
   64:          on_load_successful/1, on_load_failing/1,
   65:          too_many_arguments/1,
   66:          basic_errors/1,bin_syntax_errors/1,
   67:          predef/1,
   68:          maps/1,maps_type/1,maps_parallel_match/1,
   69:          otp_11851/1,otp_11879/1,otp_13230/1,
   70:          record_errors/1, otp_11879_cont/1,
   71:          non_latin1_module/1, illegal_module_name/1, otp_14323/1,
   72:          stacktrace_syntax/1,
   73:          otp_14285/1, otp_14378/1,
   74:          external_funs/1,otp_15456/1,otp_15563/1,
   75:          types/1,
   76:          removed/1, otp_16516/1,
   77:          inline_nifs/1,
   78:          undefined_nifs/1,
   79:          no_load_nif/1,
   80:          warn_missing_spec/1,
   81:          otp_16824/1,
   82:          underscore_match/1,
   83:          unused_record/1,
   84:          untyped_record/1,
   85:          unused_type2/1,
   86:          eep49/1,
   87:          redefined_builtin_type/1,
   88:          tilde_k/1,
   89:          match_float_zero/1,
   90:          undefined_module/1,
   91:          update_literal/1,
   92:          messages_with_jaro_suggestions/1,
   93:          illegal_zip_generator/1,
   94:          coverage/1]).
   95: 
   96: suite() ->
   97:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   98:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   99: 
  100: all() -> 
  101:     [{group, unused_vars_warn}, export_vars_warn,
  102:      shadow_vars, unused_import, unused_function,
  103:      unsafe_vars, unsafe_vars2, unsafe_vars_try, guard,
  104:      unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern,
  105:      otp_4886, otp_4988, otp_5091, otp_5276, otp_5338,
  106:      otp_5362, otp_5371, otp_7227, binary_aliases, otp_5494, otp_5644,
  107:      otp_5878, otp_5917, otp_6585, otp_6885, otp_10436, otp_11254,
  108:      otp_11772, otp_11771, otp_11872, export_all,
  109:      bif_clash, behaviour_basic, behaviour_multiple, otp_11861,
  110:      otp_7550, otp_8051, format_warn, {group, on_load},
  111:      too_many_arguments, basic_errors, bin_syntax_errors, predef,
  112:      maps, maps_type, maps_parallel_match,
  113:      otp_11851, otp_11879, otp_13230,
  114:      record_errors, otp_11879_cont,
  115:      non_latin1_module, illegal_module_name, otp_14323,
  116:      stacktrace_syntax, otp_14285, otp_14378, external_funs,
  117:      otp_15456, otp_15563,
  118:      types,
  119:      removed, otp_16516,
  120:      undefined_nifs,
  121:      no_load_nif,
  122:      inline_nifs, warn_missing_spec, otp_16824,
  123:      underscore_match, unused_record, untyped_record, unused_type2,
  124:      eep49,
  125:      redefined_builtin_type,
  126:      tilde_k,
  127:      singleton_type_var_errors,
  128:      documentation_attributes,
  129:      match_float_zero,
  130:      undefined_module,
  131:      update_literal,
  132:      messages_with_jaro_suggestions,
  133:      illegal_zip_generator,
  134:      coverage].
  135: 
  136: groups() -> 
  137:     [{unused_vars_warn, [],
  138:       [unused_vars_warn_basic, unused_vars_warn_lc,
  139:        unused_vars_warn_rec, unused_vars_warn_fun,
  140:        unused_vars_OTP_4858, unused_unsafe_vars_warn]},
  141:      {on_load, [], [on_load_successful, on_load_failing]}].
  142: 
  143: 
  144: %% Warnings for unused variables in some simple cases.
  145: unused_vars_warn_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  146:     Ts = [{basic1,
  147:            <<"f(F) -> % F unused.
  148:                 ok.
  149: 
  150: f(F, F) ->
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: g(_X) ->
  154:     y.
  155: 
  156: h(P) ->
  157:     P.
  158: 
  159: x(N) ->
  160:     case a:b() of
  161: 	[N|Y] -> % Y unused.
  162: 	    ok
  163:     end.
  164: 
  165: y(N, L) ->
  166:     lists:map(fun(T) -> T*N end, L).
  167: 
  168: z(N, L) -> % N unused
  169:     lists:map(fun(N, T) -> T*N end, L).  % N shadowed.
  170: 
  171: 
  172: c(A) ->
  173:     case A of
  174: 	1 -> B = []; % B unused.
  175: 	2 -> B = []; % B unused.
  176: 	3 -> B = f, B
  177:     end.
  178: ">>,
  179: 	   [warn_unused_vars],
  180: {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'F'}},
  181: 	   {{15,5},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  182: 	   {{22,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'N'}},
  183: 	   {{23,19},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'N','fun'}},
  184: 	   {{28,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  185: 	   {{29,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  186:           {basic2,
  187:            <<"-record(r, {x,y}).
  188:               f({X,Y}) -> {Z=X,Z=Y};
  189:               f([H|T]) -> [Z=H|Z=T];
  190:               f(#r{x=X,y=Y}) -> #r{x=A=X,y=A=Y}.
  191:               g({M, F}) -> (Z=M):(Z=F)();
  192:               g({M, F, Arg}) -> (Z=M):F(Z=Arg).
  193:               h(X, Y) -> (Z=X) + (Z=Y).">>,
  194:            [warn_unused_vars], []},
  195:           {basic3,
  196:            <<"f(E) ->
  197:                   X = Y = E.">>,
  198:            [warn_unused_vars],
  199:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  200:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}}],
  201:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  202:     ok.
  203: 
  204: %% Warnings for unused variables in list comprehensions.
  205: unused_vars_warn_lc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  206:     Ts = [{lc1, 
  207:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  208:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  209:               bin({X}) ->
  210:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  211:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  212:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  213:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  214:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  215:            ">>, 
  216:            [warn_unused_vars],
  217:            {warnings, [{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  218:                        {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  219: 
  220:           {lc2,
  221:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  222:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  223:               bin({X}) ->
  224:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  225:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  226:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  227:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  228:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  229:            ">>,
  230:            [warn_unused_vars],
  231:            {warnings,[{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  232:                       {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  233: 
  234:           {lc3,
  235:            <<"a([A]) ->
  236:                   B = foo,
  237:                   [{C,B} || {C,_} <- A];
  238:               a({A}) ->
  239:                   B = foo,
  240:                   [C || {C,_} <- [B,A]];
  241:               a({A,A}) ->
  242:                   B = foo,
  243:                   [C || {C,_} <- B, B < A].
  244:            ">>,
  245:            [warn_unused_vars],
  246:            []},
  247: 
  248:           {lc4,
  249:            <<"b(A) ->
  250:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  251:                   [C || {C,_} <- A].
  252:            ">>,
  253:            [warn_unused_vars],
  254:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  255: 
  256:           {lc5,
  257:            <<"c(A) ->
  258:                   B = foo,
  259:                   [C || {C,_} <- A],
  260:                   B.
  261:            ">>,
  262:            [warn_unused_vars],
  263:            []},
  264: 
  265:           {lc6,
  266:            <<"d(A) ->
  267:                   B = foo,
  268:                   [{A,B} || {Id,_} <- A]. % Id unused.
  269:            ">>,
  270:            [warn_unused_vars],
  271:            {warnings,[{{3,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Id'}}]}},
  272: 
  273:           {lc7,
  274:            <<"e(A) ->
  275:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  276:                   [B || B <- A]. % B shadowed.
  277:            ">>,
  278:            [warn_unused_vars],
  279:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  280:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  281: 
  282:           {lc8,
  283:            <<"f(A) ->
  284:                   B = foo,
  285:                   [B || B <- A], % B shadowed.
  286:                   B.
  287:            ">>,
  288:            [warn_unused_vars],
  289:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  290: 
  291:           {lc9,
  292:            <<"g(A) ->
  293:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  294:                   [A || B <- A]. % B shadowed, B unused.
  295:            ">>,
  296:            [warn_unused_vars],
  297:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  298:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  299:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  300: 
  301:           {lc10,
  302:            <<"h(A) ->
  303:                   B = foo,
  304:                   [A || B <- A], % B shadowed, B unused.
  305:                   B.
  306:            ">>,
  307:            [warn_unused_vars],
  308:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  309:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  310: 
  311:           {lc11,
  312:            <<"i(X) ->
  313:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  314:                         Z = X <- [foo]]. % X and Z shadowed. X unused!
  315:            ">>,
  316:            [warn_unused_vars],
  317:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  318:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  319:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  320:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  321: 
  322:           {lc12,
  323:            <<"j({X}) ->
  324:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  325:                         Z <- X = [[1,2,3]], % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  326:                         Z <- X, % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  327:                         Z <- X]; % Z shadowed.
  328:               j(X) ->
  329:                   [foo || X <- X, % X shadowed.
  330:                         X <-    % X shadowed. X unused.
  331:                              X =
  332:                                  Y = [[1,2,3]], % Y unused.
  333:                         X <- [], % X shadowed.
  334:                         X <- X]. % X shadowed. X unused.
  335:            ">>,
  336:            [warn_unused_vars],
  337:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  338:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  339:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  340:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  341:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  342:                       {{5,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  343:                       {{7,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  344:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  345:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  346:                       {{10,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  347:                       {{11,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  348:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  349:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  350: 
  351:           {lc13,
  352:            <<"k(X) ->
  353:                   [Z || Z <- Y = X]; % Y unused.
  354:               k(X) ->
  355:                   [Z || Z <- X = Y = X]; % Y unused!
  356:               k(X) ->
  357:                   [Z || Z <- begin X = Y = X, Y end];
  358:               k(X) ->
  359:                   [{Y,W} || W <- Y = X]; % Y unbound
  360:               k(X) ->
  361:                   [Z || Z <- (Y = X), % Y unused.
  362:                        Y > X]; % Y unbound.
  363:               k(X) ->
  364:                   [Y || Y = X > 3, Z = X]; % Z unused.
  365:               k(X) ->
  366:                   [Z || Y = X > 3, Z = X]. % Y unused.
  367:            ">>,
  368:            [warn_unused_vars],
  369:            {error,[{{8,21},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}},
  370:                    {{11,24},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}}],
  371:                   [{{2,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  372:                    {{4,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  373:                    {{8,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  374:                    {{10,31},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  375:                    {{13,36},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  376:                    {{15,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  377: 
  378:           {lc14,
  379:            <<"lc2() ->
  380:                   Z = [[1],[2],[3]], 
  381:                   [X || Z <- Z, % Z shadowed.
  382:                         X <- Z].
  383:            ">>,
  384:            [warn_unused_vars],
  385:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  386: 
  387:           {lc15,
  388:            <<"lc3() ->
  389:                   Z = [1,2,3], 
  390:                   [X || X <- Z, 
  391:                         Z <- Z]. % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  392:            ">>,
  393:            [warn_unused_vars],
  394:            {warnings,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  395:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  396: 
  397:           {lc16,
  398:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  399:                   case bar of
  400:                       true ->
  401:                           U = 2;
  402:                       false ->
  403:                           true
  404:                   end,
  405:                   case bar of
  406:                       true ->
  407:                           X = 2;
  408:                       false ->
  409:                           X = 3
  410:                   end,
  411:                   case foo of
  412:                       true ->
  413:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  414:                       false ->
  415:                           4
  416:                   end,
  417:                   case foo of
  418:                       1 ->
  419:                           U; % U unsafe.
  420:                       2 ->
  421:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z]; % (X exported.) U unused.
  422:                       3 ->
  423:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  424:                           U % U unsafe.
  425:                   end.
  426:            ">>,
  427:            [warn_unused_vars],
  428:            {error,[{{22,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  429:                    {{27,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  430:             [{{16,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  431:              {{24,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  432:              {{26,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  433: 
  434:           {lc17,
  435:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  436:                   %% This used to pass erl_lint...
  437:                   case bar of
  438:                       true ->
  439:                           U = 2;
  440:                       false ->
  441:                           true
  442:                   end,
  443:                   case bar of
  444:                       true ->
  445:                           X = 2;
  446:                       false ->
  447:                           X = 3
  448:                   end,
  449:                   case foo of
  450:                       true ->
  451:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  452:                       false ->
  453:                           4
  454:                   end,
  455:                   [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  456:                   U. % U unsafe.
  457:            ">>,
  458:            [warn_unused_vars],
  459:            {error,[{{22,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{3,19}}}}],
  460:             [{{17,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  461:              {{21,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  462: 
  463:           {lc18,
  464:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  465:                   case bar of
  466:                       true ->
  467:                           U = 2;
  468:                       false ->
  469:                           true
  470:                   end,
  471:                   case bar of
  472:                       true ->
  473:                           X = 2;
  474:                       false ->
  475:                           X = 3
  476:                   end,
  477:                   case foo of
  478:                       true ->
  479:                           Y = 3;
  480:                       false ->
  481:                           4
  482:                   end,
  483:                   [B || <<U: % U unused
  484:                           U>> <- X, <<B:Y>> <- Z]. % U unsafe. Y unsafe. 
  485: 						% U shadowed. (X exported.)
  486:            ">>,
  487:            [warn_unused_vars],
  488:            {error,[{{21,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  489:                    {{21,41},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'Y',{'case',{14,19}}}}],
  490:             [{{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}
  491:             ]}},
  492: 
  493:           {lc19,
  494:            <<"p({B,C}) ->
  495:                   <<A:B,A:C>> = <<17:32>>;
  496:               p(B) ->
  497:                   <<A:B>> = <<17:32>>. % A unused.
  498:            ">>,
  499:            [warn_unused_vars],
  500:            {warnings,[{{4,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}}]}},
  501: 
  502:           {lc20,
  503:            <<"c({I1,I2}) ->
  504:                   if
  505:                       <<I1:I2>> == <<>> ->
  506:                           foo
  507:                   end;
  508:               c([C1,C2]) -> % C1 unused.
  509:                   case foo of
  510:                       <<C2:C2,
  511:                         C3:C2>> -> % C3 unused.
  512:                           bar
  513:                   end.
  514: 
  515:            ">>,
  516:            [warn_unused_vars],
  517:            {warnings,[{{6,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C1'}},
  518:                       {{7,19},sys_core_fold,{nomatch,no_clause}},
  519:                       {{9,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C3'}}]}},
  520: 
  521:           {lc21,
  522:            <<"t() ->
  523:                   S = 8,
  524:                   case <<3:8>> of
  525:                       <<X:S>> ->
  526:                           X;
  527:                       <<S:X>> -> % X unbound
  528:                           foo
  529:                   end;
  530:               t() ->
  531:                   S = 8,
  532:                   case <<3:8>> of
  533:                       <<S:S>> ->
  534:                           S;
  535:                       <<Q:32>> -> % Q unused.
  536:                           foo
  537:                   end.
  538:            ">>,
  539:            [warn_unused_vars],
  540:            {error,[{{6,27},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'X'}}],
  541:                   [{{14,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}}]}}
  542: 
  543:           ],
  544:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  545:     ok.

  548: %% Warnings for unused variables in records.
  549: unused_vars_warn_rec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  550:     Ts = [{rec1, % An example provided by Bjorn.
  551:            <<"-record(edge,
  552:                       {ltpr,
  553:                        ltsu,
  554:                        rtpr,
  555:                        rtsu
  556:                       }).
  557: 
  558:               f1(#edge{ltpr = A, ltsu = A}) ->
  559:                   true;
  560:               f1({Q, Q}) ->
  561:                   true.
  562: 
  563:               f2(Edge, Etab) ->
  564:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  565:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same,ltsu=Same}} -> ok;
  566:                       {value,_} -> error
  567:                   end.
  568: 
  569:               bar(Edge, Etab) ->
  570:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  571:                       {Same,Same} -> ok;
  572:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same}} -> ok; % Same unused.
  573:                       {value,_} -> error
  574:                   end.
  575:            ">>,
  576:            [warn_unused_vars],
  577:            {warnings,[{{22,41},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Same'}}]}},
  578:           {rec2,
  579:            <<"-record(r, {a,b}).
  580:               f(X, Y) -> #r{a=[K || K <- Y], b=[K || K <- Y]}.
  581:               g(X, Y) -> #r{a=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y),
  582:                             b=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y)}.
  583:               h(X, Y) -> #r{a=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end,
  584:                             b=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  585:               i(X, Y) -> #r{a=if is_list(Y) -> Y end, b=if is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  586:              ">>,
  587:            [warn_unused_vars],
  588:            {warnings,[{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  589:                       {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},

  591:                       {{7,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}},
  592:           {rec3,
  593:            <<"-record(r, {a}).
  594:               t() -> X = 1, #r{a=foo, a=bar, a=qux}.

  600:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  601:     ok.

  603: %% Warnings for unused variables in funs.
  604: unused_vars_warn_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  605:     Ts = [{fun1,

  792: %% Warnings for exported variables.
  793: export_vars_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  794:     Ts = [{exp1,
  795:            <<"u() ->
  796:                   case foo of
  797:                       1 ->
  798:                           A = 1,
  799:                           B = 2,
  800:                           W = 3, % W unused.
  801:                           Z = 3; % Z unused.
  802:                       2 ->
  803:                           B = 2,
  804:                           Z = 4 % Z unused.
  805:                   end,
  806:                   case bar of
  807:                       true ->
  808:                           A = 17, % A unsafe.
  809:                           X = 3, % X unused.
  810:                           U = 2,
  811:                           U;
  812:                       false ->
  813:                           B = 19, % B exported.
  814:                           U = 3; % U unused.
  815:                       foo ->
  816:                           X = 3,
  817:                           X;
  818:                       bar ->
  819:                           X = 9, % X unused.
  820:                           U = 14 % U unused.
  821:                   end.
  822:            ">>,
  823:            [warn_unused_vars],
  824:            {error,[{{14,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'case',{2,19}}}}],

  832:                    {{26,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  833: 
  834:           {exp2,

  869:

  900: %% Shadowed variables are tested in other places, but here we test
  901: %% that the warning can be turned off.
  902: shadow_vars(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  903:     Ts = [{shadow1,
  904: 	   <<"bin(A) ->
  905:                   receive
  906:                       M ->
  907:                            X = M,
  908:                            Y = M,
  909:                            Z = M
  910:                   end,
  911:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A],
  912:                   Y = B,
  913:                   [B || B <- Z]. % B shadowed.
  914:            ">>,
  915: 	   [nowarn_shadow_vars],
  916: 	   {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  917: 	    [{{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}}]}},
  918:           {shadow2,
  919:            <<"t() ->
  920:                   _ = (catch MS = MS = 1), % MS used unsafe
  921:                   _ = case ok of _ -> fun() -> ok end end,
  922:                   fun (MS) -> MS end. % MS not shadowed here
  923:            ">>,
  924:            [],
  925:            []}],
  926:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  927:     ok.

 1642:                     Acc = 2;
 1643:                   _ ->
 1644:                     try
 1645:                       Acc = 3,
 1646:                       Acc
 1647:                     catch _:_ ->
 1648:                       ok
 1649:                     end
 1650:                 end,
 1651:                 Acc.
 1652:            ">>,
 1653:            [],
 1654:            {errors,[{{13,17},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'Acc',{'try',{6,21}}}}],[]}}],
 1655:         [] = run(Config, Ts),
 1656:     ok.

 1676: 		  [ {X,Tail} || <<X,Tail/bytes>> <= Bin ];

 2169:                  end.
 2170:              ">>,
 2171:            [],
 2172:            {warnings,[{{1,24},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},
 2173:                       {{1,26},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
 2174:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'A','fun'}},
 2175:                       {{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
 2176:                       {{2,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B','fun'}},
 2177:                       {{3,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}}]}},
 2178:           {otp_5091_14,
 2179:            <<"t() ->
 2180:                  A = 4,

 2182:                        A>>) -> 2 end.

 2594: %% OTP-15456. All compiler options can now be given in the option list
 2595: %% (as opposed to only in files).
 2596: otp_15456(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2597:     Ts = [
 2598:           %% {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{M,F,A}]} can now be given
 2599:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2600:           %% Wherever it occurs, it is not affected by
 2601:           %% warn_deprecated_function.
 2602:           {otp_15456_1,
 2603:            <<"-compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,0}}).
 2604:               -export([foo/0]).
 2605: 
 2606:               foo() ->
 2607:                   {erlang:now(), random:seed0(), random:seed(1, 2, 3),
 2608:                    random:uniform(), random:uniform(42)}.
 2609:            ">>,
 2610:            {[{nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,seed0,0}},
 2611:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{random,uniform,0},
 2612:                                           {random,uniform,1}]},
 2613:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2614:              %% turn of warnings for functions that are not
 2615:              %% deprecated or not used in the module.
 2616:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,uniform_s,1}},
 2617:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,abs,1}},
 2618:              warn_deprecated_function]},
 2619:            {warnings,[{{5,50},erl_lint,
 2620:                        {deprecated,{random,seed,3},
 2621:                         "use the 'rand' module instead"}}]}},
 2622: 
 2623:           %% {nowarn_unused_function,[{M,F,A}]} can be given
 2624:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2625:           %% It was incorrectly documented to only work when
 2626:           %% given in an attribute.
 2627:           {otp_15456_2,
 2628:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,foo/0}).
 2629:               foo() -> ok.
 2630:               bar() -> ok.
 2631:               foobar() -> ok.
 2632:               barf(_) -> ok.
 2633:               other() -> ok.
 2634:            ">>,
 2635:            {[{nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0},{foobar,0}]},
 2636:              {nowarn_unused_function,{barf,1}},
 2637:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2638:              %% turn of warnings for unused functions that are not
 2639:              %% defined in the module.
 2640:              {nowarn_unused_function,{not_defined_in_module,1}},
 2641:              warn_unused_function]},
 2642:            {warnings,[{{6,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{other,0}}}]}
 2643:           }],
 2644: 
 2645:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 2646:     ok.

 3199:                 1.
 3200:          ">>,
 3201:     {warnings,[{{7,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{node,0}}},
 3202:                {{8,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{mfa,0}}}]} =
 3203:         run_test2(Config, Ts, []),
 3204:     ok.
 3205: 
 3206: %% OTP-11771. Do not allow redefinition of the types arity(_) &c..
 3207: otp_11771(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3208:     Ts = <<"
 3209:             -module(newly).
 3210: 
 3211:             -export([t/0]).
 3212: 
 3213:             %% No longer allowed in 17.0:
 3214:             -type arity() :: atom().
 3215:             -type bitstring() :: list().
 3216:             -type iodata() :: integer().
 3217:             -type boolean() :: iodata().
 3218: 
 3219:             -type t() :: arity() | bitstring() | iodata() | boolean().
 3220: 
 3221:             -spec t() -> t().
 3222: 
 3223:             t() ->
 3224:                 1.
 3225:          ">>,
 3226:     {warnings,[{{7,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{arity,0}}},
 3227:                {{8,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{bitstring,0}}},
 3228:                {{9,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{iodata,0}}},
 3229:                {{10,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{boolean,0}}}]} =
 3230:         run_test2(Config, Ts, []),
 3231:     ok.
 3232: 
 3233: %% OTP-11872. The type map() undefined when exported.
 3234: otp_11872(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3235:     Ts = <<"
 3236:             -module(map).
 3237: 
 3238:             -export([t/0]).
 3239: 
 3240:             -export_type([map/0, product/0]).
 3241: 
 3242:             -opaque map() :: unknown_type().
 3243: 
 3244:             -spec t() -> map().
 3245: 
 3246:             t() ->
 3247:                 1.
 3248:          ">>,
 3249:     {error,[{{6,14},erl_lint,{undefined_type,{product,0}}},
 3250:             {{8,30},erl_lint,{undefined_type,{unknown_type,0}}}],
 3251:      [{{8,14},erl_lint,{redefine_builtin_type,{map,0}}}]} =
 3252:         run_test2(Config, Ts, []),
 3253:     ok.
 3254: 
 3255: %% OTP-7392. Warning for export_all.
 3256: export_all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3257:     Ts = <<"-module(export_all_module).
 3258:             -compile([export_all]).
 3259: 
 3260:             id(I) -> I.
 3261:            ">>,
 3262:     [] = run_test2(Config, Ts, [nowarn_export_all]),
 3263:     {warnings,[{{2,14},erl_lint,export_all}]} =
 3264: 	run_test2(Config, Ts, []),
 3265:     ok.
 3266: 
 3267: %% Test warnings for functions that clash with BIFs.
 3268: bif_clash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3269:     Ts = [{clash1,
 3270:            <<"t(X) ->
 3271:                   size(X).
 3272: 
 3273:               %% No warning for the following calls, since they
 3274:               %% are unambigous.
 3275:               b(X) ->
 3276:                   erlang:size(X).
 3277: 
 3278:               c(X) ->
 3279:                   ?MODULE:size(X).
 3280: 
 3281:               size({N,_}) ->
 3282:                 N.
 3283:              ">>,
 3284:            [nowarn_unexported_function],
 3285: 	   {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{size,1}}}]}},
 3286: 
 3287: 	  %% Verify that warnings cannot be turned off in the old way.
 3288: 	  {clash2,
 3289:            <<"-export([t/1,size/1]).
 3290:               t(X) ->
 3291:                   size(X).
 3292: 
 3293:               size({N,_}) ->
 3294:                 N.
 3295: 
 3296:               %% My own abs/1 function works on lists too. From R14 this really works.
 3297:               abs([H|T]) when $a =< H, H =< $z -> [H-($a-$A)|abs(T)];
 3298:               abs([H|T]) -> [H|abs(T)];
 3299:               abs([]) -> [];
 3300:               abs(X) -> erlang:abs(X).
 3301:              ">>,
 3302: 	   {[nowarn_unused_function,nowarn_bif_clash]},
 3303: 	   {errors,[{erl_lint,disallowed_nowarn_bif_clash}],[]}},
 3304: 	  %% As long as noone calls an overridden BIF, it's totally OK
 3305: 	  {clash3,
 3306:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3307:               size({N,_}) ->
 3308:                 N;
 3309:               size(X) ->
 3310:                 erlang:size(X).
 3311:              ">>,
 3312: 	   [],
 3313: 	   []},
 3314: 	  %% For a pre R14 bif, it used to be an error, but is now a warning
 3315: 	  {clash4,
 3316:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3317:               size({N,_}) ->
 3318:                 N;
 3319:               size(X) ->
 3320:                 size(X).
 3321:              ">>,
 3322: 	   [],
 3323: 	   {warnings,[{{5,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{size,1}}}]}},
 3324: 	  %% For a post R14 bif, its only a warning; also check symbolic funs
 3325: 	  {clash5,
 3326:            <<"-export([binary_part/2,f/0]).
 3327:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3328:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3329:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3330:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3331:               f() -> fun binary_part/2.
 3332:              ">>,
 3333: 	   [],
 3334: 	   {warnings,[{{3,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{binary_part,2}}},
 3335:                       {{6,22},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{binary_part,2}}}]}},
 3336: 	  %% If you really mean to call yourself here, you can "unimport" size/1
 3337: 	  {clash6,
 3338:            <<"-export([size/1,f/0]).
 3339:               -compile({no_auto_import,[size/1]}).
 3340:               size([]) ->
 3341:                 0;
 3342:               size({N,_}) ->
 3343:                 N;
 3344:               size([_|T]) ->
 3345:                 1+size(T).
 3346:               f() -> fun size/1.
 3347:              ">>,
 3348: 	   [],
 3349: 	   []},
 3350: 	  %% Same for the post R14 autoimport warning
 3351: 	  {clash7,
 3352:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3353:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3354:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3355:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3356:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3357:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3358:              ">>,
 3359: 	   [],
 3360: 	   []},
 3361:           %% but this doesn't mean the local function is allowed in a guard...
 3362: 	  {clash8,
 3363:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3364:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3365:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>> ->
 3366:                  hej.
 3367:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3368:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3369:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3370:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3371:              ">>,
 3372: 	   [],
 3373: 	   {errors,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3374:           %% no_auto_import is not like nowarn_bif_clash, it actually removes the autoimport
 3375: 	  {clash9,
 3376:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3377:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3378:               x(X) ->
 3379:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3380:              ">>,
 3381: 	   [],
 3382: 	   {errors,[{{4,18},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3383:           %% but we could import it again...
 3384: 	  {clash10,
 3385:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3386:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3387:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3388:               x(X) ->
 3389:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3390:              ">>,
 3391: 	   [],
 3392: 	   []},
 3393:           %% and actually use it in a guard...
 3394: 	  {clash11,
 3395:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3396:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3397:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3398:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3399:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3400:              ">>,
 3401: 	   [],
 3402: 	   []},
 3403:           %% but for non-obvious historical reasons, imported functions cannot be used in
 3404: 	  %% fun construction without the module name...
 3405: 	  {clash12,
 3406:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3407:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3408:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3409:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3410:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3411:              ">>,
 3412: 	   [],
 3413: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{fun_import,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3414:           %% Not from erlang and not from anywhere else
 3415: 	  {clash13,
 3416:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3417:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3418:               -import(x,[binary_part/2]).
 3419:               x(X) ->
 3420:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3421:              ">>,
 3422: 	   [],
 3423: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{fun_import,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3424: 	  %% ...while real auto-import is OK.
 3425: 	  {clash14,
 3426:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3427:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3428:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3429:              ">>,
 3430: 	   [],
 3431: 	   []},
 3432:           %% Import directive clashing with old bif used to be an error, now a warning
 3433: 	  {clash15,
 3434:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3435:               -import(x,[abs/1]).
 3436:               x(X) ->
 3437:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}).
 3438:              ">>,
 3439: 	   [],
 3440: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{abs,1}}}]}},
 3441: 	  %% For a new BIF, it's only a warning
 3442: 	  {clash16,
 3443:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3444:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3445:               x(X) ->
 3446:                  abs(X).
 3447:              ">>,
 3448: 	   [],
 3449: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3450: 	  %% And, you cannot redefine already imported things that aren't auto-imported
 3451: 	  {clash17,
 3452:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3453:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3454:               -import(y,[binary_port/3]).
 3455:               x(X) ->
 3456:                  abs(X).
 3457:              ">>,
 3458: 	   [],
 3459: 	   {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_import,{{binary_port,3},x}}}],[]}},
 3460: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3461: 	  {clash18,
 3462:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3463:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3464:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3465:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3466:               x(X) ->
 3467:                  abs(X).
 3468:              ">>,
 3469: 	   [],
 3470: 	   {errors,[{{3,15},erl_lint,{define_import,{binary_port,3}}}],[]}},
 3471: 	  %% Like clash8: Dont accept a guard if it's explicitly module-name called either
 3472: 	  {clash19,
 3473:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3474:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/3]}).
 3475:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3476:               binary_port(A,B,C) when x:binary_part(A,B,C) ->
 3477:                  binary_part(A,B,C+1).
 3478:              ">>,
 3479: 	   [],
 3480: 	   {errors,[{{4,39},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr}],[]}},
 3481: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3482: 	  {clash20,
 3483:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3484:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3485:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3486:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3487:              ">>,
 3488: 	   [warn_unused_import],
 3489: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3490: 	  %% Don't accept call to a guard BIF if there is a local definition
 3491: 	  %% or an import with the same name. Note: is_record/2 is an
 3492: 	  %% exception, since it is more of syntatic sugar than a real BIF.
 3493: 	  {clash21,
 3494:            <<"-export([is_list/1]).
 3495:               -import(x, [is_tuple/1]).
 3496:               -record(r, {a,b}).
 3497:               x(T) when is_tuple(T) -> ok;
 3498:               x(T) when is_list(T) -> ok.
 3499:               y(T) when is_tuple(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3500:               y(T) when is_list(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3501:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) -> ok;
 3502:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) =:= true -> ok;
 3503:               y(T) when is_record(T, r) =:= true -> ok.
 3504:               is_list(_) ->
 3505:                 ok.
 3506:               is_record(_, _) ->
 3507:                 ok.
 3508:               is_record(_, _, _) ->
 3509:                 ok.
 3510:              ">>,
 3511: 	   [{no_auto_import,[{is_tuple,1}]}],
 3512: 	   {errors,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3513: 		    {{5,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3514: 		    {{6,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3515: 		    {{7,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3516: 		    {{8,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}},
 3517: 		    {{9,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}}],[]}},
 3518: 	  %% We can also suppress all auto imports at once
 3519: 	  {clash22,
 3520:           <<"-export([size/1, binary_part/2]).
 3521:              -compile(no_auto_import).
 3522:              size([]) ->
 3523:                0;
 3524:              size({N,_}) ->
 3525:                N;
 3526:              size([_|T]) ->
 3527:                1+size(T).
 3528:              binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3529:                binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3530:              binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3531:                binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3532:             ">>,
 3533: 	   [],
 3534: 	   []}
 3535: 	 ],
 3536: 
 3537:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3538:     ok.
 3539: 
 3540: %% Basic tests with one behaviour.
 3541: behaviour_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3542:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3543:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3544:              ">>,
 3545:            [],
 3546: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3547: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}}]}},
 3548: 
 3549: 	  {behaviour2,
 3550:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3551:               -export([stop/1]).
 3552:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3553:              ">>,
 3554:            [],
 3555: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}},
 3556: 	  
 3557: 	  {behaviour3,
 3558:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test American spelling.
 3559:               -export([start/2,stop/1]).
 3560:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3561:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3562:              ">>,
 3563:            [],
 3564:            []},
 3565: 
 3566:           {behaviour4,
 3567:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test callbacks with export_all
 3568:               -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
 3569:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3570:              ">>,
 3571:            [],
 3572:            {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}}
 3573: 	 ],
 3574:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3575: 
 3576:     Subst0 = #{behaviour1 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3577:                behaviour2 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3578:                behaviour4 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func]},
 3579:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst0)),
 3580: 
 3581:     Subst = #{K => [nowarn_behaviours] || K := _ <- Subst0},
 3582:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3583: 
 3584:     ok.
 3585: 
 3586: %% Basic tests with multiple behaviours.
 3587: behaviour_multiple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3588:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3589:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3590:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3591:              ">>,
 3592:            [],
 3593: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3594: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}},
 3595: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}}]}},
 3596: 
 3597: 	  {behaviour2,
 3598:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3599:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3600:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3601:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3602:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3603:               init(_) -> ok.
 3604:              ">>,
 3605:            [],
 3606: 	   []},
 3607: 
 3608: 	  {american_behavior2,
 3609:            <<"-behavior(application).
 3610:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3611:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3612:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3613:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3614:               init(_) -> ok.
 3615:              ">>,
 3616:            [],
 3617: 	   []},
 3618: 
 3619: 	  {behaviour3,
 3620:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3621:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3622:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3623:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3624:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3625:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3626:              ">>,
 3627:            [],
 3628: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3629: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3630: 		      {{2,16},
 3631: 		       erl_lint,
 3632: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3633: 	  {american_behavior3,
 3634:            <<"-behavior(gen_server).
 3635:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3636:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3637:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3638:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3639:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3640:              ">>,
 3641:            [],
 3642: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3643: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3644: 		      {{2,16},
 3645: 		       erl_lint,
 3646: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3647: 
 3648: 	  {behaviour4,
 3649:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3650:               -behaviour(gen_statem).
 3651:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3652:               -export([init/1,handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,
 3653:                        handle_info/2,handle_info/3,
 3654:                        handle_event/3,handle_sync_event/4,
 3655:                        code_change/3,code_change/4,
 3656:                        terminate/2,terminate/3,terminate/4,
 3657:                        callback_mode/0]).
 3658:               init(_) -> ok.
 3659:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3660:               handle_event(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3661:               handle_sync_event(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3662:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3663:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3664:               handle_info(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3665:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3666:               code_change(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3667:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3668:               terminate(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3669:               terminate(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3670:               callback_mode() -> state_functions.
 3671:              ">>,
 3672:            [],
 3673: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},
 3674: 		       erl_lint,
 3675: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},gen_statem,{1,22},gen_server}},
 3676: 		      {{3,16},
 3677: 		       erl_lint,
 3678: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}}
 3679: 	 ],
 3680:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3681: 
 3682:     Subst = #{behaviour3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3683:                              nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3684:               american_behavior3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3685:                                      nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3686:               behaviour4 => [nowarn_conflicting_behaviours]},
 3687:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3688: 
 3689:     ok.
 3690: 
 3691: %% OTP-11861. behaviour_info() and -callback.
 3692: otp_11861(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3693:     CallbackFiles = [callback1, callback2, callback3,
 3694:                      bad_behaviour1, bad_behaviour2,
 3695:                      bad_behaviour3],
 3696:     lists:foreach(fun(M) ->
 3697:                           F = filename:join(?datadir, M),
 3698:                           Opts = [{outdir,?privdir}, return],
 3699:                           {ok, M, []} = compile:file(F, Opts)
 3700:                   end, CallbackFiles),
 3701:     CodePath = code:get_path(),
 3702:     true = code:add_path(?privdir),
 3703:     Ts = [{otp_11861_1,
 3704:            <<"
 3705:               -export([b1/1]).
 3706:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3707:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3708: 
 3709:               -spec b1(atom()) -> integer().
 3710:               b1(A) when is_atom(A)->
 3711:                   3.
 3712:              ">>,
 3713:            [],
 3714:            %% b2/1 is optional in both modules
 3715:            {warnings,[{{4,16},erl_lint,
 3716:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b1,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3717:           {otp_11861_2,
 3718:            <<"
 3719:               -export([b2/1]).
 3720:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3721:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3722: 
 3723:               -spec b2(integer()) -> atom().
 3724:               b2(I) when is_integer(I)->
 3725:                   a.
 3726:              ">>,
 3727:            [],
 3728:            %% b2/1 is optional in callback2, but not in callback1
 3729:            {warnings,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{b1,1},callback1}},
 3730:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,
 3731:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b2,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3732:           {otp_11861_3,
 3733:            <<"
 3734:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3735:               -optional_callbacks({b1,1}). % non-existing and ignored
 3736:              ">>,
 3737:            [],
 3738:            []},
 3739:           {otp_11861_4,
 3740:            <<"
 3741:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3742:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3743:              ">>,
 3744:            [],
 3745:            %% No behaviour-info(), but callback.
 3746:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3747:           {otp_11861_5,
 3748:            <<"
 3749:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3750:              ">>,
 3751:            [],
 3752:            %% No behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3753:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3754:           {otp_11861_6,
 3755:            <<"
 3756:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3757:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3758:              ">>,
 3759:            [],
 3760:            %% behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3761:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3762:           {otp_11861_7,
 3763:            <<"
 3764:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3765:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3766:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3767:              ">>,
 3768:            [],

 3770:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}},

 3772:             []}},

 3907:     Ts = [{otp_7550,

 3913:                   <<A/utf8-unit:1>>.

 3918:                   <<A:8/utf16-unit:1>>.

 3920:                   <<A/utf16-unit:1>>.

 3925:                   <<A:8/utf32-unit:1>>.

 3927:                   <<A/utf32-unit:1>>.
 3928:              ">>,
 3929:            [],

 3955: 
 3956: %% Check that format warnings are generated.
 3957: format_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3958:     L1 = 23,
 3959:     L2 = 5,
 3960:     format_level(1, L1, Config),
 3961:     format_level(2, L1+L2, Config),
 3962:     format_level(3, L1+L2, Config),             %there is no level 3
 3963:     ok.
 3964: 
 3965: format_level(Level, Count, Config) ->
 3966:     W = get_compilation_result(Config, "format",
 3967:                                      [{warn_format, Level}]),
 3968:     %% Pick out the 'format' warnings.
 3969:     FW = lists:filter(fun({_Line, erl_lint, {format_error, _}}) -> true;
 3970:                                (_) -> false
 3971:                             end,
 3972:                             W),
 3973:     case length(FW) of
 3974:               Count ->
 3975:                   ok;
 3976:               Other ->
 3977:                   io:format("Expected ~w warning(s); got ~w", [Count,Other]),
 3978:                   fail()
 3979:           end,
 3980:     ok.
 3981:

 3985: on_load_successful(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3986:     Ts = [{on_load_1,
 3987: 	   %% Exported on_load function.
 3988: 	   <<"-export([do_on_load/0]).
 3989:              -on_load(do_on_load/0).
 3990:              do_on_load() -> ok.
 3991:              ">>,
 3992: 	   {[]},				%Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 3993: 	   []},

 3996: 	   %% Local on_load function.
 3997: 	   <<"-on_load(do_on_load/0).
 3998:              do_on_load() -> ok.
 3999:              ">>,
 4000: 	   {[]},				%Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 4001: 	   []},
 4002: 
 4003: 	  {on_load_3,
 4004: 	   %% Local on_load function, calling other local functions.
 4005: 	   <<"-on_load(do_on_load/0).
 4006:              do_on_load() -> foo().
 4007:              foo() -> bar(5) + 42.
 4008:              bar(N) -> 2*N.
 4009:              ">>,
 4010: 	   {[]},				%Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 4011: 	   []}
 4012: 	 ],

 4014:     ok.

 4229:             []}},
 4230:           {legal_map_pattern,
 4231: 	   <<"
 4232:                -record(mapkey, {a=1,b=2}).

 4243:                         1.0 := yep,

 4249: 	   []},

 4252: 			#{a=>V} => 2,
 4253: 			#{{a,V}=>V} => 2,
 4254: 			#{ \"hi\" => wazzup, hi => ho } => yep,
 4255: 			[try a catch _:_ -> b end] => nope,
 4256: 			ok => 1.0,
 4257: 			[3+3] => nope,
 4258: 			1.0 => yep,
 4259: 			{3.0+3} => nope,
 4260: 			{yep} => yep,
 4261: 			[case a of a -> a end] => nope
 4262: 		      }.
 4263: 	   ">>,
 4264: 	   [],
 4265: 	   []},
 4266: 	   {errors_in_map_keys_pattern,
 4267: 	   <<"t(#{ a := 2,
 4268: 	           #{} := A,
 4269: 	           #{ 3 => 33 } := hi,
 4270: 	           #{ 3 := 33 } := hi,
 4271: 	           #{ hi => 54, \"hello\" => 45 } := hi,
 4272: 		   #{ V => 33 } := hi }) ->
 4273: 	       A.
 4274: 	   ">>,
 4275: 	   [],
 4276: 	   {errors,[{{4,18},erl_lint,illegal_map_construction},
 4277:                     {{6,9},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'V'}}],[]}},
 4278:           {unused_vars_with_empty_maps,
 4279:            <<"t(Foo, Bar, Baz) -> {#{},#{}}.">>,
 4280:            [warn_unused_variables],
 4281:            {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Foo'}},
 4282:                       {{1,28},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Bar'}},
 4283:                       {{1,33},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Baz'}}]}}],
 4284:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4285:     ok.
 4286:

 4473: %% OTP-11879: The -spec f/a :: (As) -> B; syntax removed,
 4474: %% and is_subtype/2 deprecated.
 4475: otp_11879(_Config) ->
 4476:     Fs = [{attribute,0,file,{"file.erl",0}},
 4477:           {attribute,0,module,m},
 4478:           {attribute,1,spec,
 4479:            {{f,1},
 4480:             [{type,2,'fun',[{type,3,product,[{var,4,'V1'},
 4481:                                              {var,5,'V1'}]},
 4482:                             {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}},
 4483:           {attribute,20,callback,
 4484:            {{cb,21},
 4485:             [{type,22,'fun',[{type,23,product,[{var,24,'V1'},
 4486:                                                {var,25,'V1'}]},
 4487:                              {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}}],
 4488:     {error,[{"file.erl",
 4489:              [{1,erl_lint,{spec_fun_undefined,{f,1}}},
 4490:               {2,erl_lint,spec_wrong_arity},
 4491:               {22,erl_lint,callback_wrong_arity}]}],
 4492:      []} = compile_forms(Fs, [return,report]),
 4493:     ok.
 4494: 
 4495: compile_forms(Terms, Opts) ->
 4496:     Forms = [erl_parse:anno_from_term(Term) || Term <- Terms],
 4497:     compile:forms(Forms, Opts).
 4498:

 4567: %% OTP-14285: We currently don't support non-latin1 module names.
 4568: 
 4569: non_latin1_module(Config) ->
 4570:     Expected = [non_latin1_module_unsupported],
 4571:     Expected = check_module_name('юникод'),
 4572:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([256,$a,$b,$c])),
 4573:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([$a,$b,256,$c])),
 4574: 
 4575:     "module names with non-latin1 characters are not supported" =
 4576:         format_error(non_latin1_module_unsupported),
 4577:     BadCallback =
 4578:         {bad_callback,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4579:     BadModule =
 4580:         {bad_module,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4581:     "explicit module not allowed for callback "
 4582:     "'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'/0" =
 4583:         format_error(BadCallback),
 4584:     UndefBehav = {undefined_behaviour,'кирилли́ческий атом'},
 4585:     "behaviour 'кирилли́ческий атом' undefined" =
 4586:         format_error(UndefBehav),
 4587:     Ts = [{non_latin1_module,
 4588:            <<"
 4589:             %% Report uses of module names with non-Latin-1 characters.
 4590: 
 4591:             -import('кирилли́ческий атом', []).
 4592:             -behaviour('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4593:             -behavior('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4594: 
 4595:             -callback 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> a.
 4596: 
 4597:             %% erl_lint:gexpr/3 is not extended to check module name here:
 4598:             t1() when 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4599:                 b.
 4600: 
 4601:             t2() ->
 4602:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4603: 
 4604:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> atom().
 4605: 
 4606:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом'(integer()) ->
 4607:               'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4608: 
 4609:             'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4610:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':f(),
 4611:                 F = f,
 4612:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':F()."/utf8>>,
 4613:            [],
 4614:            {error,
 4615:             [{{4,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4616:              {{5,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4617:              {{6,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4618:              {{8,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4619:              {{8,14},erl_lint,BadCallback},
 4620:              {{11,23},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr},
 4621:              {{15,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4622:              {{17,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4623:              {{17,14},erl_lint,BadModule},
 4624:              {{20,15},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4625:              {{23,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4626:              {{25,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported}],
 4627:             [{{5,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav},
 4628:              {{6,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav}]}}],
 4629:     run(Config, Ts),
 4630:     ok.
 4631: 
 4632: illegal_module_name(_Config) ->
 4633:     [empty_module_name] = check_module_name(''),
 4634: 
 4635:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x00'),
 4636:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x1F'),
 4637:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x7F'),
 4638:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80'),
 4639:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80xyz'),
 4640:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x9Fxyz'),
 4641: 
 4642:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name,
 4643:      non_latin1_module_unsupported] = check_module_name('атом\x00'),
 4644: 
 4645:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name(' '),
 4646:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xA0'),
 4647:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xAD'),
 4648:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('  \xA0\xAD '),
 4649: 
 4650:     %% White space and soft hyphens are OK if there are visible
 4651:     %% characters in the name.
 4652:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4653:     ok = check_module_name('abc '),
 4654:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4655:     ok = check_module_name(' abc xyz '),
 4656:     ok = check_module_name(' abc\xADxyz '),
 4657: 
 4658:     ok.
 4659: 
 4660: check_module_name(Mod) ->
 4661:     File = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl",
 4662:     L1 = erl_anno:new(1),
 4663:     Forms = [{attribute,L1,file,{File,1}},
 4664:              {attribute,L1,module,Mod},
 4665:              {eof,2}],
 4666:     _ = compile:forms(Forms),
 4667:     case compile:forms(Forms, [return]) of
 4668:         {error,Errors,[]} ->
 4669:             [{_ModName,L}] = Errors,
 4670:             lists:sort([Reason || {1,erl_lint,Reason} <- L]);
 4671:         {ok,Mod,Code,Ws} when is_binary(Code), is_list(Ws)  ->
 4672:             ok
 4673:     end.
 4674: 
 4675: otp_14378(Config) ->
 4676:     Ts = [
 4677:           {otp_14378_1,
 4678:            <<"-export([t/0]).
 4679:               -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,1}}).
 4680:               t() ->
 4681:                  erlang:now().">>,
 4682:            [],
 4683:            {warnings,[{{4,18},erl_lint,
 4684:                        {deprecated,{erlang,now,0},
 4685:                         "see the \"Time and Time Correction in Erlang\" "
 4686:                         "chapter of the ERTS User's Guide for more "
 4687:                         "information"}}]}}],
 4688:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4689:     ok.

 4739: stacktrace_syntax(Config) ->
 4740:     Ts = [{guard,
 4741:            <<"t1() ->
 4742:                   try error(foo)
 4743:                   catch _:_:Stk when is_number(Stk) -> ok
 4744:                   end.
 4745:            ">>,
 4746:            [],
 4747:            {errors,[{{3,48},erl_lint,{stacktrace_guard,'Stk'}}],[]}},
 4748:           {bound,
 4749:            <<"t1() ->
 4750:                   Stk = [],
 4751:                   try error(foo)
 4752:                   catch _:_:Stk -> ok
 4753:                   end.
 4754:            ">>,
 4755:            [],
 4756:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}}],[]}},
 4757:           {bound_in_pattern,
 4758:            <<"t1() ->
 4759:                   try error(foo)
 4760:                   catch _:{x,T}:T -> ok
 4761:                   end.
 4762:            ">>,
 4763:            [],
 4764:            {errors,[{{3,33},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'T'}}],[]}},
 4765:           {guard_and_bound,
 4766:            <<"t1() ->
 4767:                   Stk = [],
 4768:                   try error(foo)
 4769:                   catch _:_:Stk when is_integer(Stk) -> ok
 4770:                   end.
 4771:            ">>,
 4772:            [],
 4773:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}},
 4774:                     {{4,49},erl_lint,{stacktrace_guard,'Stk'}}],[]}}
 4775:          ],
 4776: 
 4777:     run(Config, Ts),
 4778:     ok.

 4781: %% Unicode atoms.
 4782: otp_14285(Config) ->
 4783:     %% A small sample of all the errors and warnings in module erl_lint.

 4889:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V}) ->
 4890:                   V.

 4892:                   V.

 4894:               g(#r1{f = 3, _ = 42}) ->
 4895:                 g.
 4896:              ">>,
 4897:            [],

 4899:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init}],[]}},

 4901:            %% No error since "_ = '_'" is actually used as a catch-all
 4902:            %% initialization. V is unused (as compilation with the 'E'
 4903:            %% option shows), but no warning about V being unused is
 4904:            %% output.
 4905:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4906:               t(V) ->
 4907:                   #r{f = 3, _ = V}.
 4908:               u(V) ->
 4909:                   #r{_ = V, f = 3}.
 4910:              ">>,
 4911:            [],
 4912:            []},
 4913:           {otp_16516_3,
 4914:            %% No error in this case either. And no unused variable warning.

 4916:               t(V) when #r{f = 3, _ = V} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4917:                   a.
 4918:               u(V) when #r{_ = V, f = 3} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4919:                   a.
 4920:              ">>,
 4921:            [],
 4922:            []}],

 5305:            ">>,
 5306:            [EnableMaybe],
 5307:            {errors,[{{9,20},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'else',{4,19}}}},
 5308:                     {{9,22},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'B',{'else',{4,19}}}}],
 5309:             []}},
 5310: 
 5311:           {exp4,
 5312:            <<"t(X) ->
 5313:                   maybe
 5314:                       X()
 5315:                   else
 5316:                       ok ->
 5317:                           A = 42;
 5318:                       error ->
 5319:                           error
 5320:                   end,
 5321:                   A.
 5322:            ">>,
 5323:            [EnableMaybe],
 5324:            {errors,[{{10,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'else',{4,19}}}}],
 5325:             []}},
 5326: 
 5327:           %% Using '?=' not at the top-level of a 'maybe' ... 'else' is forbidden.
 5328:           {illegal_maybe_match1,
 5329:            <<"t(X) ->
 5330:                   maybe (ok ?= X()) end.
 5331:            ">>,
 5332:            [EnableMaybe],
 5333:            {errors,[{{2,29},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'?='"]}],[]}},
 5334:           {illegal_maybe_match2,
 5335:            <<"t(X) ->
 5336:                   ok ?= X().
 5337:            ">>,
 5338:            [EnableMaybe],
 5339:            {errors,[{{2,22},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'?='"]}],[]}}
 5340:          ],
 5341: 
 5342:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5343:     ok.

 5550: %% For certain kinds of errors that are easily caused by typos, error 
 5551: %% messages try to suggest fixes according to jaro_similarity.
 5552: messages_with_jaro_suggestions(Config) ->
 5553:     Ts = [{on_load_fun,
 5554:            <<"-on_load(foa/0).
 5555:               foo() -> ok.">>,
 5556:            {[]},
 5557:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_on_load,{foa,0},foo}}],
 5558:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,0}}}]}},
 5559:           {undefined_nif,
 5560:            <<"-export([foo/1,bar/2]).
 5561:               -nifs([foa/1,bar/1]).
 5562:               -on_load(init/0).
 5563:               init() ->
 5564:                   ok = erlang:load_nif(\"./example_nif\", 0).
 5565:               foo(_X) ->
 5566:                   erlang:nif_error(nif_library_not_loaded).
 5567:               bar(_X,_Y) ->
 5568:                   erlang:nif_error(nif_library_not_loaded).">>,
 5569:            {[]},
 5570:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_nif,{bar,1},{bar,[2]}}},
 5571:                     {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_nif,{foa,1},{foo,[1]}}}],[]}},
 5572:           {record_and_field,
 5573:            <<"-record(meep, { moo, muu }).
 5574:               t(State) ->
 5575:                   Var = State#meep.mo,
 5576:                   State#mee{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5577:            {[]},
 5578:            {error,[{{3,36},erl_lint,{undefined_field,meep,mo,moo}},
 5579:                    {{4,24},erl_lint,{undefined_record,mee,meep}}],
 5580:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}},
 5581:              {{3,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Var'}}]}},

 5584:               t(State) ->
 5585:                   Var = State#meep.moo,
 5586:                   Stat#meep{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5587:            {[]},
 5588:            {error,[{{4,19},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Stat','State'}}],
 5589:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}}]}},
 5590:           {undefined_fun,
 5591:            <<"-export([bar/1,foo/2]).
 5592:               baz(X) -> X.
 5593:               foo(X) -> X.
 5594:               foo(X, Y, Z) -> X + Y + Z.">>,
 5595:            {[]},
 5596:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{bar,1},{baz,[1]}}},
 5597:                    {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{foo,2},{foo,[1,3]}}}],
 5598:                   [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{baz,1}}},
 5599:                    {{3,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,1}}},
 5600:                    {{4,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,3}}}]}},

 5602:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{an_not_used,1}]}).
 5603:               and_not_used(_) -> foo.">>,
 5604:            {[]},
 5605:            {error,[{{1,22}, erl_lint,
 5606:                     {bad_nowarn_unused_function,{an_not_used,1},{and_not_used,[1]}}}],

 5610:               foa(A) -> {A}.
 5611:               ba(A, A) -> [A].">>,
 5612:            {[]},

 5614:                    {{1,22},erl_lint,{bad_inline,{foo,1},{foa,[1]}}}],
 5615:                   [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foa,1}}},
 5616:                    {{3,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{ba,2}}}]}},
 5617:           {bad_dialyzer_attribute,
 5618:             <<"-dialyzer({nowarn_function,[foo/2,bar/1]}).
 5619:                 foo(X, Y, Z) -> X + Y + Z.
 5620:                 baz(A) -> A.">>,
 5621:             {[]},
 5622:             {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{bar,1},{baz,[1]}}},
 5623:                     {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{foo,2},{foo,[3]}}}],
 5624:                    [{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,3}}},
 5625:                     {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_function,{baz,1}}}]}}
 5626:          ],

 5628:

 5630: 
 5631: illegal_zip_generator(Config) ->
 5632:     Ts = [{not_generator,
 5633:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{foo,0}]}).
 5634:             foo() -> [X + Y || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [5,6,7] && X > 1].
 5635:             ">>,
 5636:            {[]},
 5637:            {errors,[{{2,68},erl_lint,illegal_zip_generator}],[]}},
 5638:            {not_generator,
 5639:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0}]}).
 5640:             bar() -> [X + Y || X <- [[1,2],[3,4]] && lists:sum(X) > 0 && Y <- [5,6,7]].
 5641:             ">>,
 5642:            {[]},
 5643:            {errors,[{{2,67},erl_lint,illegal_zip_generator}],[]}}
 5644:            ],
 5645:     [] = run(Config,Ts),
 5646: 
 5647:     ok.
 5648: 
 5649: coverage(Config) ->
 5650:     do_coverage(),
 5651: 
 5652:     Ts = [{keyword_warning,
 5653:            <<"-feature(maybe_expr, disable).
 5654:               -compile(warn_keywords).
 5655:               f() -> maybe.
 5656:               g() -> 'maybe'.
 5657:             ">>,
 5658:            [],
 5659:            {warnings,[{{3,22},erl_lint,{future_feature,maybe_expr,'maybe'}}]}},
 5660: 
 5661:           {invalid_stuff,
 5662:            <<"-record(r, {a}).
 5663:               f() -> []().
 5664:               g() -> (no_record)#r{a=42}.
 5665:             ">>,
 5666:            [no_copt],
 5667:            {warnings,[{{2,22},erl_lint,invalid_call},
 5668:                       {{3,33},erl_lint,invalid_record}]}}
 5669:          ],
 5670:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5671: 
 5672:     ok.
 5673: 
 5674: %% Improve code coverage for erl_parse and erl_lint by compiling
 5675: %% all source code in STDLIB.
 5676: do_coverage() ->
 5677:     Wc = filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "src/*.erl"),
 5678:     KernelInc = filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include"),
 5679:     StdlibInc = filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
 5680:     Res = [begin
 5681:                Mod = filename:rootname(filename:basename(File)),
 5682:                Opts = [return,binary,'E',
 5683:                        {i,KernelInc},{i,StdlibInc}],
 5684:                case compile:file(File, Opts) of
 5685:                    {ok,_,_,_} ->
 5686:                        Mod
 5687:                end
 5688:            end || File <- filelib:wildcard(Wc)],
 5689:     io:format("~p\n", [Res]),
 5690:     ok.
 5691: 
 5692: %%%
 5693: %%% Common utilities.
 5694: %%%
 5695: 
 5696: rewrite([{Name,Code,[],{warnings,_}}=H|T], Subst) ->
 5697:     case Subst of
 5698:         #{Name := Opts} ->
 5699:             io:format("~s: testing with options ~p\n", [Name,Opts]),
 5700:             [{Name,Code,Opts,[]}|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5701:         #{} ->
 5702:             [H|rewrite(T, Subst)]
 5703:     end;
 5704: rewrite([H|T], Subst) ->
 5705:     [H|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5706: rewrite([], _Subst) ->
 5707:     [].
 5708: 
 5709: format_error(E) ->
 5710:     lists:flatten(erl_lint:format_error(E)).
 5711: 
 5712: run(Config, Tests) ->
 5713:     F = fun({N,P,Ws,E}, BadL) ->
 5714:                 io:format("### ~s\n", [N]),
 5715:                 case catch run_test(Config, P, Ws) of
 5716:                     E -> 
 5717:                         BadL;
 5718:                     Bad -> 
 5719:                         io:format("~nTest ~p failed. Expected~n  ~p~n"
 5720:                                   "but got~n  ~p~n", [N, E, Bad]),
 5721: 			fail()
 5722:                 end
 5723:         end,
 5724:     lists:foldl(F, [], Tests).
 5725: 
 5726: %% Compiles a test file and returns the list of warnings/errors.
 5727: 
 5728: get_compilation_result(Conf, Filename, Warnings) ->
 5729:     DataDir = ?datadir,
 5730:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5731:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File++".erl"),
 5732:     FileS = binary_to_list(Bin),
 5733:     {match,[{Start,Length}|_]} = re:run(FileS, "-module.*\\n"),
 5734:     Test = lists:nthtail(Start+Length, FileS),
 5735:     case run_test(Conf, Test, Warnings) of
 5736:         {warnings, Ws} -> Ws;
 5737:         {errors,Es,Ws} -> {Es,Ws};
 5738:         [] -> []
 5739:     end.
 5740: 
 5741: %% Compiles a test module and returns the list of errors and warnings.
 5742: 
 5743: run_test(Conf, Test0, Warnings0) ->
 5744:     Test = list_to_binary(["-module(lint_test). ", Test0]),
 5745:     run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0).
 5746: 
 5747: run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0) ->
 5748:     Filename = "lint_test.erl",
 5749:     DataDir = ?privdir,
 5750:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5751:     Opts = case Warnings0 of
 5752:                {Warnings} ->		%Hairy trick to not add export_all.
 5753:                    [return|Warnings];
 5754:                Warnings ->
 5755:                    [export_all,return|Warnings]
 5756:            end,
 5757:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 5758: 
 5759:     %% We will use the 'binary' option so that the compiler will not
 5760:     %% compare the module name to the output file name. Also, there
 5761:     %% is no reason to produce an output file since we are only
 5762:     %% interested in the errors and warnings.
 5763: 
 5764:     %% Print warnings, call erl_lint:format_error/1. (But note that
 5765:     %% the compiler will ignore failing calls to erl_lint:format_error/1.)
 5766:     compile:file(File, [binary,report|Opts]),
 5767: 
 5768:     case compile:file(File, [binary|Opts]) of
 5769:         {ok, _M, Code, Ws} when is_binary(Code) ->
 5770:             warnings(File, Ws, Test);
 5771:         {error, [{File,Es}], []} ->
 5772:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5773: 	    {errors, call_format_error(Es), []};
 5774:         {error, [{File,Es}], [{File,Ws}]} ->
 5775:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5776:             print_diagnostics(Ws, Test),
 5777: 	    {error, call_format_error(Es), call_format_error(Ws)};
 5778:         {error, [{File,Es1},{File,Es2}], []} ->
 5779:             print_diagnostics(Es1, Test),
 5780:             print_diagnostics(Es2, Test),
 5781: 	    {errors2, Es1, Es2}
 5782:     end.
 5783: 
 5784: warnings(File, Ws, Source) ->
 5785:     case lists:append([W || {F, W} <- Ws, F =:= File]) of
 5786:         [] ->
 5787: 	    [];
 5788:         L ->
 5789:             print_diagnostics(L, Source),
 5790: 	    {warnings, call_format_error(L)}
 5791:     end.
 5792: 
 5793: call_format_error(L) ->
 5794:     %% Smoke test of format_error/1 to make sure that no crashes
 5795:     %% slip through.
 5796:     _ = [Mod:format_error(Term) || {_,Mod,Term} <- L],
 5797:     L.
 5798: 
 5799: print_diagnostics(Warnings, Source) ->
 5800:     case binary:match(Source, <<"-file(">>) of
 5801:         nomatch ->
 5802:             Lines = binary:split(Source, <<"\n">>, [global]),
 5803:             Cs = [print_diagnostic(W, Lines) || W <- Warnings],
 5804:             io:put_chars(Cs);
 5805:         _ ->
 5806:             %% There are probably fake line numbers greater than
 5807:             %% the number of actual lines.
 5808:             ok
 5809:     end.
 5810: 
 5811: print_diagnostic({{LineNum,Column},Mod,Data}, Lines) ->
 5812:     Line0 = lists:nth(LineNum, Lines),
 5813:     <<Line1:(Column-1)/binary,_/binary>> = Line0,
 5814:     Spaces = re:replace(Line1, <<"[^\t]">>, <<" ">>, [global]),
 5815:     CaretLine = [Spaces,"^"],
 5816:     [io_lib:format("~p:~p: ~ts\n", [LineNum,Column,Mod:format_error(Data)]),
 5817:      Line0, "\n",
 5818:      CaretLine, "\n\n"];
 5819: print_diagnostic(_, _) ->
 5820:     [].
 5821: 
 5822: fail() ->
 5823:     ct:fail(failed).
